title: Summary review of Power BI Update March 2022
excerpt: A new month, a new power bi update, this time for March 2022. Lets see what is in this month update!!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1
